004package pgs;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import kut.*;
008import mkt.Models;
009import mkt.Model;
010import data.SimParams;
011import data.Imodel;
012import data.Vals;
013import main.Fns;
014import main.Db;
015import main.Cts;
016
017/** Rank global Page. */
018public class ModelsPg {
019  /**
020  Process request.
021  @param drq Ditto.
022  @return JSON string.
023  */
024  public static String process (Dic<String> drq) {
025    String rq = Js.rs(drq.get("rq"));
026    switch (rq) {
027      case "idata": {
028        return Js.w(Dic.mk(
029          "Models", Js.w(Arr.map(Models.list(), (md) -> {
030              String mdId = md.id;
031              double[] bases = SimParams.paramBases(mdId);
032              double[] incrs = SimParams.paramIncrs(mdId);
033              return new Imodel(
034                mdId, md.name,
035                md.paramNames, md.paramTypes, bases, incrs
036              ).toJs();
037            }))
038        ));
039      }
040      case "rank": {
041        String mdId = Js.rs(drq.get("mdId"));
042        int i = Js.ri(drq.get("ix"));
043        String valType = Js.rs(drq.get("valType"));
044        String stats = Js.rs(drq.get("stats"));
045        String period = Js.rs(drq.get("period"));
046        Vals rss = Db.readResults(
047          mdId, period, valType, i, stats.equals("price") ? 1 : Cts.statDates
048        );
049        if (rss.vals.size() > 0) {
050          return Js.w(Dic.mk(
051            "rankOp", stats.equals("price")
052              ? Js.w(Arr.mk(Js.w(Arr.mk(
053                  Js.w(rss.date),
054                  Js.w(Arr.map(rss.vals.get(0), Js::w))
055                ))))
056              : Js.w(Arr.mk(Js.w(Arr.mk(
057                  Js.w(rss.date),
058                  Js.w(Arr.map(Fns.stats(stats, rss.vals), Js::w))
059                ))))
060            ));
061        } else {
062          return Js.w(Dic.mk("rankOp", "[]"));
063        }
064      }
065      case "bests": {
066        String mdId = Js.rs(drq.get("mdId"));
067        String valType = Js.rs(drq.get("valType"));
068        String stats = Js.rs(drq.get("stats"));
069        String period = Js.rs(drq.get("period"));
070        Vals rss = Db.readResults(
071          mdId, period, valType, 0, stats.equals("price") ? 1 : Cts.statDates
072        );
073        ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> vals = rss.vals;
074        if (vals.size() > 0) {
075          ArrayList<Integer> vs = stats.equals("price")
076            ? vals.get(0)
077            : Fns.stats(stats, vals)
078          ;
079          ArrayList<Tp<Integer, Integer>> bestsVs = new ArrayList<>();
080          for (int i = 0; i < vs.size(); i++)
081            bestsVs.add(new Tp<>(i, vs.get(i)));
082          Arr.sort(bestsVs, (v1, v2) -> v1.e2 > v2.e2);
083          return Js.w(Dic.mk(
084            "Bests", Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.take(bestsVs, 3), (v) -> Js.w(v.e1)))
085          ));
086        } else {
087          return Js.w(Dic.mk("Bests", "[]"));
088        }
089      }
090      case "history": {
091        String mdId = Js.rs(drq.get("mdId"));
092        int iRs = Js.ri(drq.get("ix"));
093        String valType = Js.rs(drq.get("valType"));
094        String stats = Js.rs(drq.get("stats"));
095        String period = Js.rs(drq.get("period"));
096
097        ArrayList<String> profits = new ArrayList<>();
098        ArrayList<String> positions = new ArrayList<>();
099        for (int i = Cts.statDates - 1 ; i >= 0 ; --i) {
100          Vals rss = Db.readResults(
101            mdId, period, valType, i, stats.equals("price") ? 1 : Cts.statDates
102          );
103          ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> vals = rss.vals;
104          if (vals.size() > 0) {
105            ArrayList<Integer> vs = stats.equals("price")
106              ? vals.get(0)
107              : Fns.stats(stats, vals)
108            ;
109            int e0 = vs.get(iRs);
110            if (e0 < 0) continue;
111            int prf = e0 - (int)mkt.Cts.initialCapital;
112            int pV = 1;
113            for (int e : vs) if (e > e0) ++pV;
114            profits.add(Js.w(prf));
115            positions.add(Js.w(pV));
116          }
117        }
118         return Js.w(Dic.mk(
119          "Profits", Js.w(profits),
120          "Positions", Js.w(positions)
121        ));
122      }
123      default: throw new RuntimeException(
124          "Value of rq (" + rq + ") is not valid"
125        );
126    }
127  }
128}
129
